posts.post_content:
Dear Wizards,  
  
Please print these dual lands at a lower rarity. I understand the Ravnica lands being printed at a higher rarity because paying life can be intimidating to newer players, but poorer players need good mana fixing. It shouldn't cost sixty dollars to build a multicolour deck that doesn't get mana screwed.  
  
Thanks.

posts.post_content:
How the hell does Hinterland prosper when their harbor is the craggiest, commercially unfriendliest stretch of meandering coastline on the entire plane?   
  
I mean *look at it*! Getting a trade boat in there without a lighthouse peering over the cliffs must be like trying to lay your hand on a [Blightwidow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightwidow) covered in [Riot Spikes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Riot Spikes)! Blindfolded!
